shortdesc.ph: Callback when the music file playback state changes.
Occurs when the playback state of the music file changes.
Occurs when the playback state of the music file changes.
Callback when the playback state of the music file changes.

p.codeblock: final void Function(AudioMixingStateType state, AudioMixingReasonType reason)? onAudioMixingStateChanged;
public virtual void OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_TYPE state, AUDIO_MIXING_REASON_TYPE reason) {}

section.p: This callback is triggered when the playback state of the music file changes and reports the current playback state and error code.
